items.title: Why LootMogul Marketplace?
items.description: A prolific sports web3 gaming and e-commerce space working with a community of athletes to build a platform that allows ownership of unique digital assets. We create a significant niche of digital collectibles that come with real-life utilities. Brands can buy, sell, trade, and promote sports-specific products.

items.title: LootMogul Marketplace- Benefits
items.description: A functional marketplace offers brands multiple monetization opportunities ensuring transparent transactions. Collectibles are sold at display museums; sports fanatics access stadium games, buy digital tokens, businesses make promotions, and buy & sell limited-edition merchandise.

items.title: Create, Sell, Collect & Share
items.description: Curate, collect and trade exclusive digital collectibles. Unique graphic trading cards, digital tokens, and sports athletesâ€™ collectibles are created and sold via the DeFi model. Secure payment options are a bonus for the members to buy and sell through reliable modes of payment with ten underlying cryptocurrencies.

items.title: Wide Range of Collection
items.description: Explore our collectibles page and purchase from a wide range of Sporticon, Platina, Meta Avatars, Trading Cards, and others from our splendid selection of digital collectibles. If you are a sports enthusiast, this section is for you. All our collectibles come with In Real Life or In Game Play utilities.
